text: k̄heā (r̀x sūl k̄hxng phwk k̄heā) kl̀āw ẁā h̄ākẁā c̄hạn dị̂ nả mā h̄ı̂ phwk th̀ān sụ̀ng næwthāng thī̀ t̄hūk t̂xng kẁā thī̀ phwk th̀ān dị̂ phbh̄ĕn brrphburus̄ʹ k̄hxng phwk th̀ān yụdt̄hụ̄x xyū̀ lèā? Phwk k̄heā kl̀āw ẁā thæ̂cring reā pĕn p̄hū̂ pt̩is̄eṭh ṣ̄rạthṭhā t̀x s̄ìng thī̀ phwk th̀ān t̄hūk s̄̀ng mā nận
